pli-tv-bi-vb-np12:2.2.11: Nuns’ relinquishment 13 to 30 are respectively identical to the monks’ relinquishment: 1, [Bu NP 1:0.5](pli-tv-bu-vb-np1:0.5); 2, [Bu NP 2:0.5](pli-tv-bu-vb-np2:0.5); 3, [Bu NP 3:0.5](pli-tv-bu-vb-np3:0.5); 6, [Bu NP 6:0.5](pli-tv-bu-vb-np6:0.5); 7, [Bu NP 7:0.5](pli-tv-bu-vb-np7:0.5); 8, [Bu NP 8:0.5](pli-tv-bu-vb-np8:0.5); 9, [Bu NP 9:0.5](pli-tv-bu-vb-np9:0.5); 10, [Bu NP 10:0.5](pli-tv-bu-vb-np10:0.5); 18, [Bu NP 18:0.5](pli-tv-bu-vb-np18:0.5); 19, [Bu NP 19:0.5](pli-tv-bu-vb-np19:0.5); 20, [Bu NP 20:0.5](pli-tv-bu-vb-np20:0.5); 22, [Bu NP 22:0.5](pli-tv-bu-vb-np22:0.5); 23, [Bu NP 23:0.5](pli-tv-bu-vb-np23:0.5); 25, [Bu NP 25:0.5](pli-tv-bu-vb-np25:0.5); 26, [Bu NP 26:0.5](pli-tv-bu-vb-np26:0.5); 27, [Bu NP 27:0.5](pli-tv-bu-vb-np27:0.5); 28, [Bu NP 28:0.5](pli-tv-bu-vb-np28:0.5); 30, [Bu NP 30:0.5](pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:0.5); with appropriate gender changes.

Following this, the Pali reads _(Dutiya) Pattavagga_ to indicate the last chapter of _nissaggiya pācittiya_ rules for the nuns, and then  _Pariṇatasikkhāpada_ to indicate the last rule in the chapter of _nissaggiya pācittiya_ rules. These indications are redundant in the present translation, since I have pointed to all the missing rules, including direct references to their counterparts in the chapter on _nissaggiya pācittiya_ rules for the _bhikkhus_.
